theme: A massive expansion of sensory capabilities: video generation, music creation, and speech synthesis are now first-class citizens.

arcs.headline: The Full A/V Studio Experience
arcs.summary: We unlocked a massive suite of multimedia tools. Video generation took a leap with LTX-2 and Grok Video. Audio got a complete overhaul with ElevenLabs Music (duration-based), ElevenLabs v3 TTS (emotional speech), and OVH Whisper for transcription.

arcs.headline: Agents, Bots, and Open Source
arcs.summary: We open-sourced Polly (our Discord bot) so the community can build their own autonomous coding agents. We also rolled out a seamless integration for OpenClaw, letting developers spin up AI agents with a single setup command.

arcs.headline: Play Page is the New Documentation
arcs.summary: We redesigned the frontend to merge the 'Docs' directly into the 'Play' page. Now, as you tweak parameters in the UI, you get live, copy-pasteable API code for that exact configurationâ€”bridging the gap between experimenting and building.

arcs.headline: Infrastructure & Billing Tuning
arcs.summary: We migrated Mistral to OVHcloud for better stability, optimized z-image for speed, and simplified the billing API into a single-bucket system that handles negative balances gracefully.

## Week of Feb 5-11, 2026

### ðŸŽ¥ Audio & Video Revolution
- **Video Generation:** Added LTX-2 (1024x1024 with audio), Grok Video, and Imagen 4 support.
- **Music & Speech:** Integrated ElevenLabs Music (`elevenmusic`) with duration billing and upgraded TTS to ElevenLabs v3 for emotional range.
- **Transcription:** Added OVH Whisper Large V3 for high-accuracy speech-to-text.
- **Discovery:** Added a programmatic `/audio/models` endpoint for developers.

### ðŸ¤– Agents & Community
- **Polly Open Source:** Released the full source code for our Discord bot, featuring semantic search and autonomous coding capabilities.
- **OpenClaw Integration:** Launched a dedicated landing page and auto-setup script to onboard OpenClaw agents in one command.
- **Roleplay Models:** Added `qwen-character` specifically optimized for roleplay scenarios.

### ðŸ’… UX & Developer Experience
- **Unified Play/Docs:** Merged documentation into the Play pageâ€”configure a model visually, then copy the generated API code instantly.
- **Frontend Redesign:** Fresh header authentication, theme customization, and improved mobile responsiveness.
- **Billing Simplification:** The balance API now returns a single unified field, and the system now gracefully handles temporary negative balances.

### âš¡ Performance & Fixes
- **Speed:** Optimized `z-image` and `flux-klein` for faster generation and lower memory usage.
- **Stability:** Migrated Mistral to OVHcloud and moved Portkey gateway to a custom domain to eliminate timeouts on long requests.
- **GSoC:** Cleaned up documentation and improved dashboard navigation for Summer of Code participants.
